body:
I add some screenshots as well.
Even with the preset for the low quality: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/METBy5Dkt9s6ybS2t9sHfL4cRY0XCFvLTu639QphtX6kpo2CurmhtfGpNX*mCImkO1cm*n3heBGEx8JXto*p0lcZoZGzZZJs/Capture6.JPG)
You can see that in the read me panel it says that there are some preset values but then when the simulation run, only the ab value is the right one and can be customized:
[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/METBy5Dkt9trR8rE7Byf3aiDklCmYGK4oG36xLoiIIzh60tEoqVAD604pLFetsmz8NWMV3OPWdE34qnreLNBNdDcbk-q8Now/Capture5.JPG)ad 1000, ar 300 and aa 0.1.

Thanks in advance,
Claudio
